basic.description:
This course will explore topics that are current and/or of special interest in the area of health enhancement and disease prevention. Offered periodically by visiting professors or members of the faculty. Students should check with the School regarding availability. Restricted to students in a concentration in health studies, kinesiology or physical and health education. 
NOTE    Priority access to HLTH students.
LEARNING HOURS    108 (36L;72P)
basic.subject: HLTH
basic.title: Special Topics in Health Studies

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE  2nd yr and HLTH101 & registration in a KINE, HLTH or PHED plan
